attributes.action: Repeal the unfair and unbalanced extradition arrangemernts with the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present arrangements between the UK and USA are unbalanced and unfair. They discriminate against UK citizens. The USA can successfully extradite UK citizens without showing good cause. The UK cannot extradite from the USA on the same basis. This is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
